name: Cardboard Catbox Painful Pitfalls
description:
The evil SquidBox has stolen CatBox's comic. Help Catbox get back his comics in this 2d retro style platformer.  Controls- A = Left, D = right, UpArrow = jump.

WebGL game made with unity, tested and working in Firefox and Chrome browsers

Follow me on twitter  https://twitter.com/squiddy_mc
